nodes.text: Garth Ennis (born January 16, 1970) is an Irish comic writer, who wrote the Star Wars Tales comics "Trooper" and "In the Beginning." He is best known for the DC/Vertigo series Preacher and his successful revival of Marvel Comics' The Punisher franchise. His work is characterized by extreme violence, black humor, profanity, an interest in male friendship, a disdain for organized religion, and contempt for superheroes.
